dct_title_s: Varanasi city tourist map / produced for the Department of Tourism, Government of India, by India Tourism Development Corporation. (Verso)
dct_description_sm: "Based upon Survey of India map with permission of the Surveyor General of India." Includes inset and index to points of interest. Text, color illustration, location map, and list of Government of India tourist offices on verso.
dct_publisher_sm: [New Delhi, India] : India Tourism Development Corporation, 1979.
